title: Tech employees face another tough week of cross-stage layoffs - TechCrunch
content:
1. Tech employees face another tough week of cross-stage layoffs  TechCrunch
  2. Tech Layoffs And Hiring Freezes Appear To Accelerate  Crunchbase News
  3. Tech layoffs need context, not alarmist hot takes  San Francisco Examiner
  4. Tech is hitting the brakes on hiring even as other industries keep adding jobs  CNBC
  5. View Full Coverage on Google News
description: Tech giants like Uber, Meta and Twitter enforce hiring freezes, while layoffs descend on employees at companies like Carvana, Latch, DataRobot and Section4.
